content: As an AI language model, I cannot make predictions or express personal opinions. However, it is likely that we will see more crops being edited in the future as gene-editing technology advances and becomes more widely available. The potential benefits of gene-edited crops in terms of increased food production, improved nutrition, and resilience to environmental stresses are significant, and may prove to be important tools in addressing global challenges such as climate change and food insecurity. However, it is important that the technology is used responsibly, with proper regulation and consideration for ethical and environmental concerns.
